column5: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XwpKjEa4LYY%26hl=en_US%26feature=player_embedded%26version=3  What do you think? I wouldn't want to go jumping pressure cracks with these on.  I would think if you hit bump big enough, they would come off.  Cool idea though!
Similar to this...only this system looks like it bolts up directly vs attaching via some sort of clamping mechanism...
they look like they could get me into some serious trouble....need a helicopter to get out...lol...

Oh... I could build you some! No different than the strap on SKIS I made for Leah's airplane.  Had a neighbour in Smiths Falls... when I was a kid about 10... he had tracks on a VW bug and skis on the front hubs.
